description: Dashboard of metrics generated by Richard Elling's cool "zpool_influxdb" utility (now included in OpenZFS).

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total reads of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Total Reads

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Total Writes

panels.description: Latency histogram for the synchronous reads of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Sync Read Queue

panels.description: Latency histogram for the asynchronous reads of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Async Read Queue

panels.description: Latency histogram for the scrub or scan reads of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Scrub/Scan Read Queue

panels.description: Latency histogram for the actual disk reads of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Disk Read Queue

panels.description: Latency histogram for the synchronous writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Sync Write Queue

panels.description: Latency histogram for the asynchronous writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Async Write Queue

panels.description: Latency histogram for the trim or unmap operations of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Trim Write Queue

panels.description: Latency histogram for the disk write operations of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Disk Write Queue

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Logical Async Reads

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Logical Sync Reads

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Logical Scrub Reads

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Logical Async Writes

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Logical Sync Writes

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Logical Trim Writes

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Physical Async Reads

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Physical Sync Reads

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Physical Scrub Reads

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Physical Async Writes

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Physical Sync Writes

panels.description: Latency histogram for the total writes of a ZFS pool
panels.title: Physical Trim Writes

list.definition: show tag values from "zpool_stats" with key = "host"
list.name: hostname
list.query: show tag values from "zpool_stats" with key = "host"

list.definition: show tag values from "zpool_stats" with key = "name"  where "host" =~ /^$hostname/
list.name: poolname
list.query: show tag values from "zpool_stats" with key = "name"  where "host" =~ /^$hostname/

title: ZFS Pool Metrics1
